import PuzzleStep from '@/components/sudoku/PuzzleStep'
import SudokuEmbed from '@/components/sudoku/SudokuEmbed'
import YouTubeEmbed from '@/components/blog/YouTubeEmbed'

# Modern Sudoku Techniques #1

This post demonstrates the embeddable components available in blog posts.

## Interactive Puzzle (SudokuPad)

Embed puzzles directly from f-puzzles, SudokuPad, or Penpa:

<SudokuEmbed
  puzzle="https://f-puzzles.com/?"
  title="Try this thermo sudoku"
  height={450}
/>

## Static Screenshots

For step-by-step explanations, use screenshots:

```jsx
<PuzzleStep
  src="/images/puzzles/step1.png"
  caption="The 9 must go in the bulb"
  size="md"
/>
```

**Sizes:** `sm` (200px), `md` (300px), `lg` (400px), `full`

## YouTube Videos

Embed puzzle solve videos:

```jsx
<YouTubeEmbed
  video="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID"
  title="Simon solves a thermo sudoku"
  start={120}  // optional: start at 2:00
/>
```

{/* Uncomment to embed an actual video:
<YouTubeEmbed
  video="yKf9aUIxdb4"
  title="CTC: Miracle Sudoku"
/>
*/}
